BLE SETUP:
“打开测试平板电脑，点击iFit图标启动应用程序如果需要安装应用程序：高级iFIT会员WiFi平板/ iPad平板电脑连接设置：通过访问www.iFit.com加入iFit购买/激活您的iFit高级会员。打开平板电脑蓝牙开启下载iFit蓝牙平板电脑应用程序登录到您的iFit帐户，并关闭弹出窗口跳过设备配对，然后点击“得到它”注意：平板电脑/ iPad的应用程序要求：•Android 5.0 +蓝牙4.0 + •使用iOS 8+的iPad 3及以上版本•屏幕宽度至少为600dp dp = px /（ppi / 160）“

Turn on test tablet.
Tap iFit icon to launch app.

If App Setup Needed:
Premium iFIT Membership
WiFi Connection For Tablet/iPad
  

BLE Tablet App Setup:
Join iFit by visiting www.iFit.com.
Purchase/Activate your iFit Premium Membership.
Turn tablet Bluetooth ON.
Download the iFit Bluetooth Tablet App.
Sign into your iFit account and close popup windows.
Skip the device pairing and tap “Got It”.

NOTE: Tablet/iPad Requirements for App:
• Android 5.0+ with Bluetooth 4.0+
• iPad 3 and above with iOS 8+
• A minimum of 600dp screen width.  dp = px / ( ppi / 160 )
ESD Bag:
确认防静电包装袋已经耗尽，并按照图纸进行打印。

Verify that the ESD bag is dissipative and it is printed on as per the drawing.
Cosmetic, Color, and Texture:
“确认防静电袋是耗散的，并按照图纸打印。
确保将设备包装在防静电袋中。
目视检查控制台是否存在外观缺陷，物理损坏和难以辨认的打印。
验证控制台匹配图片
“

Verify that the ESD bag is dissipative and it is printed on as per the drawing.
Ensure the unit is packaged in an antistatic bag. 
Visually inspect the console for cosmetic defects, physical damage, and illegible printing.  
Verify console matches picture
BLE Test:
如果控制台显示“Hello”或“ifit.com/activate”，请按住iFit（SYNC）按钮10秒钟
触摸屏幕左上角的用户个人资料图标
在下拉列表中，触摸蓝牙
按控制台上的iFIT同步按钮，验证显示屏中间的4字符十六进制代码（例如：“DF69”）。
在弹出窗口中，验证与4字符十六进制代码匹配的控制台的信号强度为0.5m（> 50％）
连接到与4个字符的十六进制代码匹配的控制台
触摸屏幕左上角的用户个人资料图标
在下拉列表中，触摸蓝牙
断开与控制台的连接

If console displays  "Hello" or "ifit.com/activate", press and hold the iFit (SYNC) button for 10 seconds
Touch user profile icon at the upper left  of the screen
In drop down list, touch Bluetooth
Press the iFIT sync button on the console and verify a 4 character hex code in the middle of the display (Example: “DF69”). 
In the pop up window, verify signal strength of the console that matches the 4 character hex code is at 0.5m is (>50%)
Connect to the console that matches the 4 character hex code
Touch user profile icon at the upper left  of the screen
In drop down list, touch Bluetooth
Disconnect from console
Software Version:
“按下“ ON_RESET”或“ DISPLAY”按钮
验证并记录。
根据您的叠加层，使用““体重减轻”“或”“卡路里”“或”“ 14 APPS”“或”“ TEMPO APPS”“或” 1“”前进屏幕。“

Press the "ON_RESET" or "DISPLAY"  button
Verify and Record.
Advance screen with "WEIGHT LOSS" or "CALORIE" or "14 APPS" or  "TEMPO APPS" or "1", based on your overlay.
Incline Calibration:
“前进屏幕以进行校准。
按校准按钮EQF1259
按向上倾斜箭头以校准倾斜度。 确认显示器上的倾斜值短暂增加，暂停然后减小到零。”

Advance screen to incline calibrate.
Press the Calibrate buttton the EQF1259
Press Incline up arrow to calibrate incline. Verify the incline value on the display increases briefly, pauses, then decrease to zero.
Display Test:
“高级屏幕显示测试。
两次按下按钮““ FAN UP””或“ DISPLAY”或“ MANUAL”或“ AUDIO UP”或“ AUDIO DOWN”或“ GEAR PLUS ICON”或“ 6” 根据您的叠加层清除并填充所有细分。
确认没有LCD分段应变暗，缺失，重影，闪烁或熄灭。”

Advance screen to display test.
Press button "FAN UP" or "DISPLAY" or "MANUAL" or "AUDIO UP" or "AUDIO DOWN" or "GEAR PLUS ICON" or "6" two times to clear and fill all segments, based on your overlay.
Verify that there are no LCD segments should be dim, missing, ghosting, aglow, or out.
Button Test:
“进入屏幕进行关键测试。
按下控制台上的所有按钮，每个按钮将显示一个唯一的代码
前进屏幕，直到返回控制台空闲屏幕。”

Advance screen to key test.
Press all the buttons on the console and each will display a unique code
Advance screen till you return to the console idle screen.
Resistance Motor Test:
“在控制台上，按下RESISTANCE +按钮，确认EQF1259的电阻值增加。
在控制台上，按RESISTANCE - 按钮。 验证EQF1259的电阻值是否下降。“

On the console, press the RESISTANCE + button. Verify the resistance level on the EQF1259 increases.  
On the console, press the RESISTANCE - button. Verify the resistance level on the EQF1259 decreases.
Hand Pulse Test:
保持脉冲条并确认显示脉冲读数

Hold the pulse bars and verify a pulse reading is displayed
Chest Pulse Test:
“在EQF1259上，按显示按钮转到BLE脉冲屏幕。
按下开始按钮。
在控制台上运行手动锻炼。
点击控制台上的IFIT同步按钮。
验证在控制台上读取脉冲BLE脉冲。“

On the EQF1259, press Display button to goto BLE Pulse screen.
Press Start button.
Run manual workout on the console.
Tap the IFIT sync button on the console.
Verify pulse BLE pulse is read on console.
Fan Test:
“在控制台上，按大风扇按钮打开风扇，风扇应该低速运行。
再次按大风扇按钮，风扇应该运行在高位。
按小风扇按钮将风扇转到低位，然后再次按下以关闭风扇。“

On the console, press the Large Fan button to turn fan on. Fan should run on low.
Press the Large Fan button again and the fan should run on high.
Press the Small Fan button to turn fan to low, then press again to turn fan off.
Audio Test:
“将EQW1007连接到iOS音频源，并将EQW1007的另一端连接到控制台。
播放音频并验证它是否从控制台扬声器播放。
调整音量到最低和最高水平，并验证一个变化。“

Connect the EQW1007 to the iOS audio source and connect the other end of the EQW1007 to the console.
Play audio and verify that it plays out of the console speakers.
Adjust the volume to minimum and maximum level and verify a change.
Finish Test:
“按下并按住Ifit按钮（同步）并且速度增加和减少3秒钟以锁定控制台
验证是否显示“”Hello“”或“”ifit.com/activate“”
在EQF1259上，关闭控制台电源。
断开控制台上的所有电线和电缆。“

Lock console by press and holding the Ifit button (SYNC) and the Speed increase and decrease for 3 seconds
Verify that "Hello" or "ifit.com/activate" is displayed
On the EQF1259, turn off the Console power.
Disconnect all wires and cables from the console.
